con:testSuite.name: SOAP API Regression - User/Pass
con:testSuite.con:description:
Suite authentication relies on username and password set at the SUITE level.
This is so the suite can be run against VALIDATE_SOAP enabled or disabled MIDs on alternate days.
The entire suite must be run initially for authentication to succeed.
After the suite is run initially in one stack, individual test cases may be then be run in that same stack.
